title: Double word edge detection
name: LGF_GetBitStates
description:
## Short description ##

This function checks a DWord for falling as well as rising edges.
It returns the number of edges, a DWord with the edge bits, and a boolean value if edge(s) are 
present.

input.name: value
input.description: Check input value for changes and edges

output.name: hasChanged
output.description: Input value has changed (compared to the previous cycle)

output.name: noOfRisingBits
output.description: Number of rising edges in the input value

output.name: noOfFallingBits
output.description: Number of falling edges in the input value
